function.name: grep
function.description: Search for specified text patterns in files, similar to Unix grep command. Supports recursive search, case-insensitive matching, result limiting, and other options. Search scope is limited to the sandbox home directory for security.

pattern.description: Text pattern to search for, can be a plain string or regular expression (when use_regex is true)

path.description: Root directory path to search, defaults to current sandbox home directory. Supports relative paths.

recursive.description: Whether to search subdirectories recursively, defaults to true

case_sensitive.description: Whether search is case-sensitive, defaults to true

use_regex.description: Whether to interpret pattern as regular expression, defaults to false (literal string matching)

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return, 0 means return all results, defaults to 10

include_pattern.description: Pattern for including files (e.g., '*.py'), defaults to empty (all files)

exclude_pattern.description: Pattern for excluding files (e.g., '*.log'), defaults to empty

show_line_numbers.description: Whether to show line numbers, defaults to true

context_lines.description: Number of context lines to show around matches, defaults to 0 (only matching lines)
